See Safety Warnings below for more information.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23},{"style":"bold","offset":54,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":247,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"430un","text":"Silica Magnetic Beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23q84","text":"guanidine isothiocyanate 
1M Tris-HCl ph 7.5
0.2M EDTA
20% Sarkosyl
B-mercaptoethanol
PE Buffer
ddH2O
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
